definition.procedurexml: <xml xmlns="https://developers.google.com/blockly/xml"><block type="event_trigger" deletable="false" x="-13" y="25"><field name="trigger">no_ext_trigger</field><next><block type="controls_if"><mutation else="1"></mutation><value name="IF0"><block type="logic_binary_ops" inline="false"><field name="OP">AND</field><value name="A"><block type="math_binary_ops"><field name="OP">LT</field><value name="A"><block type="math_java_constants"><field name="CONSTANT">RANDOM</field></block></value><value name="B"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">1</field></block></value></block></value><value name="B"><block type="math_binary_ops"><field name="OP">GT</field><value name="A"><block type="math_java_constants"><field name="CONSTANT">RANDOM</field></block></value><value name="B"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">0.9</field></block></value></block></value></block></value><statement name="DO0"><block type="world_send_chat"><value name="text"><block type="text"><field name="TEXT">“Ogres are like onions.” – Shrek</field></block></value></block></statement><statement name="ELSE"><block type="controls_if"><mutation else="1"></mutation><value name="IF0"><block type="logic_binary_ops" inline="false"><field name="OP">AND</field><value name="A"><block type="math_binary_ops"><field name="OP">LT</field><value name="A"><block type="math_java_constants"><field name="CONSTANT">RANDOM</field></block></value><value name="B"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">0.9</field></block></value></block></value><value name="B"><block type="math_binary_ops"><field name="OP">GT</field><value name="A"><block type="math_java_constants"><field name="CONSTANT">RANDOM</field></block></value><value name="B"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">0.8</field></block></value></block></value></block></value><statement name="DO0"><block type="world_send_chat"><value name="text"><block type="text"><field name="TEXT">“Someday, I will repay you. Unless, of course, I can’t find you or if I forget.”</field></block></value></block></statement><statement name="ELSE"><block type="controls_if"><mutation else="1"></mutation><value name="IF0"><block type="logic_binary_ops" inline="false"><field name="OP">AND</field><value name="A"><block type="math_binary_ops"><field name="OP">LT</field><value name="A"><block type="math_java_constants"><field name="CONSTANT">RANDOM</field></block></value><value name="B"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">0.8</field></block></value></block></value><value name="B"><block type="math_binary_ops"><field name="OP">GT</field><value name="A"><block type="math_java_constants"><field name="CONSTANT">RANDOM</field></block></value><value name="B"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">0.7</field></block></value></block></value></block></value><statement name="DO0"><block type="world_send_chat"><value name="text"><block type="text"><field name="TEXT">“What are you doing in my swamp!?” - Shrek</field></block></value></block></statement><statement name="ELSE"><block type="controls_if"><mutation else="1"></mutation><value name="IF0"><block type="logic_binary_ops" inline="false"><field name="OP">AND</field><value name="A"><block type="math_binary_ops"><field name="OP">LT</field><value name="A"><block type="math_java_constants"><field name="CONSTANT">RANDOM</field></block></value><value name="B"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">0.7</field></block></value></block></value><value name="B"><block type="math_binary_ops"><field name="OP">GT</field><value name="A"><block type="math_java_constants"><field name="CONSTANT">RANDOM</field></block></value><value name="B"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">0.6</field></block></value></block></value></block></value><statement name="DO0"><block type="world_send_chat"><value name="text"><block type="text"><field name="TEXT">“There’s a stack of freshly made waffles in the middle of the forest! Don’t you find that a wee bit suspicious?” – Shrek</field></block></value></block></statement><statement name="ELSE"><block type="controls_if"><value name="IF0"><block type="logic_binary_ops" inline="false"><field name="OP">AND</field><value name="A"><block type="math_binary_ops"><field name="OP">LT</field><value name="A"><block type="math_java_constants"><field name="CONSTANT">RANDOM</field></block></value><value name="B"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">0.6</field></block></value></block></value><value name="B"><block type="math_binary_ops"><field name="OP">GT</field><value name="A"><block type="math_java_constants"><field name="CONSTANT">RANDOM</field></block></value><value name="B"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">0.5</field></block></value></block></value></block></value><statement name="DO0"><block type="world_send_chat"><value name="text"><block type="text"><field name="TEXT">“Well my stomach aches and my palms just got sweaty, must be a high school.” – Shrek</field></block></value></block></statement></block></statement></block></statement></block></statement></block></statement></block></next></block></xml>
